member.name: M:LightSwitchApplication.Engineer.#ctor

member.name: P:LightSwitchApplication.Engineer.Application
member.summary: Gets the Application object for this application. The Application object provides access to active screens, methods to open screens and access to the current user.

member.name: M:LightSwitchApplication.DataWorkspace.#ctor
